<style>
div#shopify-section-template--15875959291965__rich_text_giExrL > .section {
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

div#shopify-section-template--15875959291965__forms > .container.vertical-breather {
    padding-top: 0;
    margin-top: 40px;
}</style>

<script>
let observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => {
  mutations.forEach((mutation) => {
    if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
      let shadowHost = document.querySelector('form-embed#app-embed');
      if (shadowHost) {
        observer.disconnect(); // Deja de observar una vez encontrado
        let shadowRoot = shadowHost.shadowRoot;
        if (shadowRoot) {
          let style = document.createElement('style');
          style.textContent = `
            /* Tus reglas de estilo aquí */
            form {
              padding-top: 10px!important;
            }
          `;
          shadowRoot.appendChild(style);
        } else {
          console.error('No se encontró el shadowRoot');
        }
      }
    }
  });
});

// Configurar el observador para observar el documento principal
observer.observe(document, { childList: true, subtree: true });

</script>
